entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
